ygData.subject: Words, WHERE?
ygData.msgSnippet: I keep hearing on this list how common words are and that people have stacks and stacks of them. Could someone please share where they are to be found in such
ygData.messageBody:
I keep hearing on this list how common words are and that people have stacks
and stacks of them. Could someone please share where they are to be found in
such large quantities? I was told that the lava crawlers in lavastorm
occasionally have them, out of 50 or so kills I found a single rune. I was
also told crocs in Oasis have them, out of about 25 or so killed I never found
one. Someone suggested I go to Lake Rathetear but suggested it might be hard
for me at level 18.

Anyway, would someone be willing to share where they find basic words in large
quantities so I can practice my skills? Or is it simply my very bad luck to
have not found one yet (I don't even know what they look like..)

Thanks,

jspectre @ innoruuk
